#0# Ariyasāvako satimā hoti paramena satinepakkena samannāgato cirakatampi
#1# cirabhāsitampi saritā anussaritā idaṁ vuccati bhikkhave satibalaṁ.
#2# Katamañca bhikkhave samādhibalaṁ idha bhikkhave ariyasāvako vivicceva

#7# Imāni kho bhikkhave satta balānīti.

#0# Diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā idaṁ vuccati bhikkhave sutadhanaṁ. Katamañca
#1# bhikkhave cāgadhanaṁ idha bhikkhave ariyasāvako vigatamalamaccherena cetasā

#4# paññādhanaṁ idha bhikkhave ariyasāvako paññavā hoti .pe.
#5# Sammādukkhakkhayagāminiyā idaṁ vuccati bhikkhave paññādhanaṁ. Imāni

#13# [7] Atha kho uggo rājamahāmatto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami
#14# upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi ekamantaṁ nisinno
#15# kho uggo rājamahāmatto bhagavantaṁ etadavoca acchariyaṁ bhante abbhutaṁ
#16# bhante yāva aḍḍhocāyaṁ bhante migāro rohaṇeyyo yāva mahaddhano
#17# yāva mahābhogoti. Kiñca { 1 Ma. kīva.} ^a^ PTS. A IV , 7 ^ea^ aḍḍho panugga migāro rohaṇeyyo kiñca
#18# mahaddhano kiñca mahābhogoti. Sataṁ bhante sahassāni { 2 Sī. sahassānaṁ. Ma. satasahassānaṁ.} hiraññassa ko
#19# pana vādo rūpiyassāti. Atthi kho etaṁ ugga dhanaṁ netaṁ natthīti
#0# Vadāmi tañca kho etaṁ ugga dhanaṁ sādhāraṇaṁ agginā udakena rājūhi
#1# corehi appiyehi dāyādehi. Satta kho imāni ugga dhanāni
#2# asādhāraṇāni agginā udakena rājūhi corehi appiyehi dāyādehi.
#3# Katamāni satta saddhādhanaṁ sīladhanaṁ hirīdhanaṁ ottappadhanaṁ sutadhanaṁ cāgadhanaṁ
#4# paññādhanaṁ imāni kho ugga satta dhanāni asādhāraṇāni agginā
#5# udakena rājūhi corehi appiyehi dāyādehīti.
#6# Saddhādhanaṁ sīladhanaṁ hirī ottappiyaṁ dhanaṁ
#7# sutadhanañca cāgo ca paññā ve sattamaṁ dhanaṁ
#8# yassa etā dhanā atthi itthiyā purisassa vā
#9# sa ve mahaddhano loke ajeyyo devamānuse.
#10# Tasmā saddhañca sīlañca pasādaṁ dhammadassanaṁ
#11# anuyuñjetha medhāvī saraṁ buddhānasāsananti.
#12# [8] Sattimāni bhikkhave saññojanāni. Katamāni satta
#13# anunayasaññojanaṁ paṭighasaññojanaṁ diṭṭhisaññojanaṁ vicikicchāsaññojanaṁ

#16# [9] Sattannaṁ bhikkhave saññojanānaṁ pahānāya samucchedāya brahmacariyaṁ
#17# vussati. Katamesaṁ sattannaṁ ^a^ PTS. A IV , 8 ^ea^ anunayasaññojanassa pahānāya
#18# samucchedāya brahmacariyaṁ vussati paṭighasaññojanassa .pe. Diṭṭhisaññojanassa
#19# vicikicchāsaññojanassa mānasaññojanassa bhavarāgasaññojanassa
#0# Avijjāsaññojanassa pahānāya samucchedāya brahmacariyaṁ
#1# vussati imesaṁ kho bhikkhave sattannaṁ saññojanānaṁ pahānāya samucchedāya
#2# brahmacariyaṁ vussati. Yato kho bhikkhave bhikkhuno anunayasaññojanaṁ
#3# pahīnaṁ hoti ucchinnamūlaṁ tālāvatthukataṁ anabhāvaṁ kataṁ āyatiṁ anuppādadhammaṁ
#4# paṭighasaññojanaṁ .pe. Diṭṭhisaññojanaṁ vicikicchāsaññojanaṁ
#5# mānasaññojanaṁ bhavarāgasaññojanaṁ avijjāsaññojanaṁ pahīnaṁ hoti
#6# ucchinnamūlaṁ tālāvatthukataṁ anabhāvaṁ kataṁ āyatiṁ anuppādadhammaṁ ayaṁ
#7# vuccati bhikkhave bhikkhu acchejji { 1 Ma. acchecchi. evamuparipi.} taṇhaṁ vivattayi saññojanaṁ
#8# sammāmānābhisamayā antamakāsi dukkhassāti.
#9# [10] Sattimāni bhikkhave saññojanāni. Katamāni satta
#10# anunayasaññojanaṁ paṭighasaññojanaṁ diṭṭhisaññojanaṁ vicikicchāsaññojanaṁ
#11# mānasaññojanaṁ issāsaññojanaṁ macchariyasaññojanaṁ imāni kho

#13# Dhanavaggo paṭhamo.
#14# Tassuddānaṁ

#18# Anusayavaggo dutiyo
#19# [11] Sattime bhikkhave anusayā. Katame satta kāmarāgānusayo
#0# Paṭighānusayo diṭṭhānusayo vicikicchānusayo mānānusayo bhavarāgānusayo
#1# avijjānusayo ime kho bhikkhave satta anusayāti.
#2# [12] Sattannaṁ bhikkhave anusayānaṁ pahānāya samucchedāya brahmacariyaṁ
#3# vussati. Katamesaṁ sattannaṁ kāmarāgānusayassa pahānāya samucchedāya

#5# mānānusayassa bhavarāgānusayassa avijjānusayassa pahānāya
#6# samucchedāya brahmacariyaṁ vussati imesaṁ kho bhikkhave sattannaṁ anusayānaṁ
#7# pahānāya samucchedāya brahmacariyaṁ vussati. Yato kho bhikkhave bhikkhuno
#8# kāmarāgānusayo pahīno hoti ucchinnamūlo tālāvatthukato anabhāvaṁ
#9# kato āyatiṁ anuppādadhammo paṭighānusayo .pe. Diṭṭhānusayo
#10# vicikicchānusayo mānānusayo bhavarāgānusayo avijjānusayo pahīno hoti
#11# ucchinnamūlo tālāvatthukato anabhāvaṁ kato āyatiṁ anuppādadhammo ayaṁ
#12# vuccati bhikkhave bhikkhu acchejji taṇhaṁ vivattayi saññojanaṁ
#13# sammāmānābhisamayā antamakāsi dukkhassāti.
#14# [13] ^a^ PTS. A IV , 10 ^ea^ Sattahi bhikkhave aṅgehi samannāgataṁ kulaṁ anupagantvā
#15# vā nālaṁ upagantuṁ upagantvā vā nālaṁ nisīdituṁ { 1 Ma. upanisīdituṁ. evamuparipi.}. Katamehi sattahi
#16# na manāpena paccuṭṭhenti na manāpena abhivādenti na manāpena āsanaṁ
#17# denti santamassa parigūhanti bahukamhi { 2 Ma. bahukampi. evamuparipi. } thokaṁ denti paṇītamhi { 3 Ma. paṇītampi. evamuparipi.} lūkhaṁ
#18# denti asakkaccaṁ denti no sakkaccaṁ imehi kho bhikkhave sattahi
#19# aṅgehi samannāgataṁ kulaṁ anupagantvā vā nālaṁ upagantuṁ upagantvā
#0# Vā nālaṁ nisīdituṁ. Sattahi bhikkhave aṅgehi samannāgataṁ kulaṁ anupagantvā
#1# vā alaṁ upagantuṁ upagantvā vā alaṁ nisīdituṁ. Katamehi
#2# sattahi manāpena paccuṭṭhenti manāpena abhivādenti manāpena
#3# āsanaṁ denti santamassa na parigūhanti bahukamhi bahukaṁ denti paṇītamhi
#4# paṇītaṁ denti sakkaccaṁ denti no asakkaccaṁ imehi kho bhikkhave
#5# sattahi aṅgehi samannāgataṁ kulaṁ anupagantvā vā alaṁ upagantuṁ
#6# upagantvā vā alaṁ nisīditunti.
#7# [14] Sattime bhikkhave puggalā āhuneyyā pāhuneyyā
#8# dakkhiṇeyyā añjalikaraṇīyā anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassa.
#9# Katame satta ubhatobhāgavimutto paññāvimutto kāyasakkhi
#10# diṭṭhippatto saddhāvimutto dhammānusārī saddhānusārī ^a^ PTS. A IV , 11 ^ea^ ime kho bhikkhave

#12# anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassāti.
#13# [15] Sattime bhikkhave udakūpamā puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā
#14# lokasmiṁ. Katame satta idha bhikkhave ekacco puggalo sakiṁ nimuggo
#15# nimuggo va hoti idha pana bhikkhave ekacco puggalo ummujjitvā
#16# nimujjati idha pana bhikkhave ekacco puggalo ummujjitvā ṭhito
#17# hoti idha pana bhikkhave ekacco puggalo ummujjitvā vipassati
#18# viloketi idha pana bhikkhave ekacco puggalo ummujjitvā patarati
#19# idha pana bhikkhave ekacco puggalo ummujjitvā patigādhappatto hoti
#0# Idha pana bhikkhave ekacco puggalo ummujjitvā tiṇṇo hoti pāragato { 1 Ma. pāraṅgato. evamuparipi.}
#1# thale tiṭṭhati brāhmaṇo. Kathañca bhikkhave puggalo sakiṁ nimuggo
#2# nimuggo va hoti idha bhikkhave ekacco puggalo samannāgato hoti
#3# ekantakāḷakehi akusalehi dhammehi evaṁ kho bhikkhave puggalo sakiṁ
#4# nimuggo nimuggo va hoti. Kathañca bhikkhave puggalo ummujjitvā
#5# nimujjati idha bhikkhave ekacco puggalo ummujjati sādhu saddhā
#6# kusalesu dhammesu sādhu hirī sādhu ottappaṁ sādhu viriyaṁ sādhu paññā
#7# kusalesu dhammesūti tassa sā saddhā neva tiṭṭhati no vaḍḍhati
#8# hāyatiyeva tassa sā hirī tassa taṁ ottappaṁ tassa taṁ viriyaṁ tassa
#9# sā paññā neva tiṭṭhati no vaḍḍhati hāyatiyeva evaṁ kho bhikkhave
#10# puggalo ummujjitvā nimujjati. Kathañca bhikkhave puggalo ummujjitvā
#11# ṭhito hoti ^a^ PTS. A IV , 12 ^ea^ idha bhikkhave ekacco puggalo ummujjati sādhu saddhā
#12# kusalesu dhammesu sādhu hirī sādhu ottappaṁ sādhu viriyaṁ sādhu paññā
#13# kusalesu dhammesūti tassa sā saddhā neva hāyati no vaḍḍhati ṭhitā
#14# hoti tassa sā hirī tassa taṁ ottappaṁ tassa taṁ viriyaṁ tassa
#15# sā paññā neva hāyati no vaḍḍhati ṭhitā hoti evaṁ kho bhikkhave
#16# puggalo ummujjitvā ṭhito hoti. Kathañca bhikkhave puggalo
#17# ummujjitvā vipassati viloketi idha bhikkhave ekacco puggalo ummujjati
#18# sādhu saddhā kusalesu dhammesu sādhu hirī sādhu ottappaṁ sādhu viriyaṁ
#19# sādhu paññā kusalesu dhammesūti so tiṇṇaṁ saññojanānaṁ parikkhayā
#0# Sotāpanno hoti avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyano evaṁ kho
#1# bhikkhave puggalo ummujjitvā vipassati viloketi. Kathañca bhikkhave
